website_summaries.verdict: This machine is worth considering if you lack space, but it comes with some quality concerns.
pros: Has a roomy concession compartment with interior light

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious popcorn. We used the great northern 8oz packages. Clean up is easy I do wish the light kept the popcorn warm but oh well. Only down side was the assembly was a little difficult Because nothing wanted to line up.
customer_reviews.author: James Hallaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Popcorn
customer_reviews.text: Great popcorn maker! I looked at a lot of different machines and this was the best for our needs. It is a great size for us and I especially liked that it came with its own cart so you don't have to worry about counter space. It is easily removable, however, if you don't need the stand. Our popcorn comes out great and smells just like the theater. We use butter flavored coconut oil and add Flavacol before putting the popcorn kernels in. Our popcorn has come out perfectly every time. The machine is also easy to clean, and when not in use, it doubles as a unique decoration in our movie themed den.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came in with a damage handle the location of it in the box was not the brightest having on the outside without the any foam protecting it. Loose screws everywhere inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Aylor Opperman

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia 8 ounce
customer_reviews.text: Makes plenty of popcorn in each batch. Wish the side table was twice as big. Overall this is a great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Lasted exactly a year before the heating element died. Not sturdy at all. Wheel keeps locking up and we can't push it out of the way. When you do move it, it feels like it will fall apart. The basket where you put the kernels and popping oil / butter isn't easy to remove to clean. Once you get it out, it is harder to insert.
customer_reviews.author: V. Plutto

customer_reviews.title: Defective :(
customer_reviews.text: The popcorn gets stuck in the kettle. You have to pry it out with a fork, and if you don’t, it will burn and make lots of smoke. In order to replace the kettle, I have to pack this one up and send it in, then wait on them to send me a new one. I don’t even know if that is the issue, and I have no idea how long this will take. Meanwhile, they have my $250 so there’s that. I understand that sometimes there are factory defects, but I should be provided a replacement immediately.
customer_reviews.author: jen m

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid product
customer_reviews.text: Some difficulty getting parts separated after shipping, but once separated, everything was there and went together well. Took about 30 minutes to assemble after unpacking and separating parts. We used the Great Northern popcorn 8oz prepared bags. Just dump the whole bag in the kettle and wait for the movie style popcorn! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine is great! The wheel and leg arrangement should be improved
customer_reviews.text: Machine is great! The wheel and leg arrangement should be improved. Wheels fell off when assembled according to instructions. Rubber leveler on non-wheel legs are a problem
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: 8oz popper but better to use 4oz prepacked kits
customer_reviews.text: Well after a few emails an phone calls I had to have my kettle replaced. It was not popping all the kernels. Once replaced I have fewer rejects an feel i am getting my monies worth. I did have to switch to 4oz packs instead of the 8oz.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love this popcorn popper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this popcorn machine! It looks great in our family room and makes incredibly good popcorn. It seriously tastes as good as the popcorn at the theater. Would definitely recommend the 10oz if you're serving several people. Wish we had purchased years ago!!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: Just got my popcorn machine the box all beat up ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got my popcorn machine the box all beat up some of parts bent my husband had to unbend I’m so mad because it was my Christmas gift and we had to fix a $250 machine!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your home theater!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good purchase for my family. We have movie night every weekend and this is the perfect addition. PROS: Makes 8oz portions in about 15 mins and tastes like you're at the movie theater. Storage area is a nice bonus. CONS: the instructions suck, you'll have to figure it out, it's not too bad tho, it's a pain to clean the cooker, I'm taking it apart, the top gear piece came off, I put a C clamp in to keep it together during dumping the popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love the popcorn machine but the set up directions weren’t the best and online was not helpful. The main popcorn popper dispenser is supposedly suppose to easily open, ours doesn’t. It’s like it’s welded shut because the screws and holes are angled jamming the lid on so we can’t take it a part to clean as easily as it’s says online either. Other than that it’s been a great machine. That might have just been a mistake on ours and once I put it all together I was not taking it apart to send back. I figured that was more of a hassle. We love it. My kids can even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this popcorn maker. It is amazing and the popcorn is delicious. It is easier to clean than our old smaller popcorn maker. The lights and switch that came with it were broken but the company sent a replacement within a week, even during the pandemic. Our friends and family are extremely jealous but we can't wait to use this for parties, too!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The box showed up packaged professionally. No dents, no issues. Assembly was pretty straight forward. Just followed the directions. Cleaned it out and washed out the pot and fired it up. Made some popcorn. The 8oz popcorn ended up being a LOT for two people. :) I ended up bringing some to work the next day to snack on. For smaller households, when not entertaining others, the 4 oz portions would probably be plenty. Popcorn came out excellent. Highly recommend. Always wanted one of these.
customer_reviews.author: DG Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, makes great popcorn, not too hard to clean. One complaint which I wouldn't call it a complaint, but one screw was missing that goes to the storage door (came assembled that way).
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Do not order this product as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift and it came bent in places and the quality was sub par. The graphic work had finger prints just not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months it stopped working right.
customer_reviews.text: First 2 months I LOVED this thing. made the best popcorn but after 2 months use the popcorn stirrer stopped working right, it spins like it suppose to until it starts popping and then it just locks up and the gears start clicking and popping, I have to shut it down and dig the popcorn out! I clean it EVERY time I use it, I am putting in the suggested amount of popcorn, I don't know what the deal is but I am sad because I LOVED this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dust

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for our shop and we love it. The popcorn maker is easy to use and set up. We selected the option with the popcorn and thought the popcorn and oil tasted great. My only complaint, the wheels had some white markings on them and my son had to wash and scrub it off. It only took 5 minutes to get them looking nice. This unit is a nice size and the heat lamp keeps your popcorn nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: What an absolute Disaster of a Machine
customer_reviews.text: So I was lucky enough to receive my Christmas gift to my family INFESTED with bugs, likely from another country, and the pan as you can clearly see was all scratched up from god knows what....And not to mention the stencil paint is running down the sides of the machine base and machine itself! Fool me once, don’t fool me twice......
customer_reviews.author: Desert Snow

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy, after the time it took to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy, after the time it took to assemble, the heater for the popping doesn't work and I can't get any support or someone to talk to and have it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great maker, but came with some dents
customer_reviews.text: Outside Package was damaged and open upon delivery. All parts were still in the box. There were 2 dents in the product, one was the shelf and the top ridge of the maker. Box did not come with instructions. Shipped in a timely manner. Maker pops very quickly and makes some awesome popcorn. Very easy to clean and detach basket for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn Popcorn
customer_reviews.text: The kids love the popcorn machine. It was the missing link in our movie room! Just followed the instructions and the popcorn turned out great every time we’ve used it. Cleaned it today and it was easier than I imagined. Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rolande

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a sturdy well put together item
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a sturdy well put together item. Took about ten minutes to put together and popped the first batch. A little awkward getting the leftovers out but not impossible. Definately recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: Popcorn machine works fine. It makes plenty for everyone and has great space for storage behind the machine. Gave it 3 stars cause the lights in the front didnt work at all. We put fresh batteries in even checked the polarity. Put in a second set of new batteries to be sure and no lights. Quality control is non existant after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: jermain sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This product has been good and makes great popcorn
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I dislike about this product is the inside of the cover, even cleaned after each use; has what appears is rust! I clean this machine after every use and I do not make it super wet and close it up. I dry it completely. That is my one complaint about this unit. This unit is about 2 years old and it started within the first year.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Scuff marks on the top boat frame,  concessions lights dosent work
customer_reviews.text: I need to contact seller. The unit was as advertised, However, there was a scuff mark on hthe frame and the concession lights don't work. Apart from this the unit works fine. If I had to do it again. I would spend the extra money and get a better quality popcorn popper
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bullock

customer_reviews.title: It is a challenge to get the product out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I must add that the unpacking of this item was horrific. It appeared as though the styrofoam was sprayed onto the product. It was well packed but horrible to unpack and the small pieces of foam were clingy and hard to get off my hands. Also the instructions were vague. I had to call the company at one point to get clarity as to where to place the plate. Once put together, it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Jones

customer_reviews.title: Missing important part, damaged door and old food inside machine
customer_reviews.text: My popcorn machine arrived without the push handle. Would be a nightmare to return so now I'm left to try and find a handle. The door is also not attached and the hardware is bent. There are no screws to attach the door either. On the bright side there was still popcorn in the machine from the previous owner. Pretty gross. I knew it was an Amazon wherhouse product but they claimed it had some dents on the top and sides but it said the product was usable. No working door or handle isn't usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concession Light Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This machine has a great look I was able to put it together with pops and pop some corn for a family movie night! However the lights for the concessions stand does not work? I have tried new batteries and looking at the connection and it does not work. I have insurance on it how can I go about getting a new working inside panel? Please advise
customer_reviews.author: G.I.P

customer_reviews.title: Need a pin for door hinge. ****Updated***
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of a pin that hold the door hinge, everything was perfect. The top pin slides right through the hinge. I have to figure out a way to keep it in. The bottom pin stays in without issue. Turns out the lights for the concession stand are not operable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip James

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for my Daughter shes 5 and she has been doing great in school and in her Music class so I rewarded her with what she wanted and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: MR Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn cart- perfect for movie night!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble Arrived in perfect condition with a manual Clean up takes time but not hard Storage compartment holds everything needed- popcorn, oil, seasoning, scoop/measuring cups
customer_reviews.author: JHR

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Quality Showpiece Popcorn Maker
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The quality can’t be beat for this price. It makes delicious popcorn, is an amazing addition to our basement, and is a constant conversation piece. The illuminated concessions door is fantastic and was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: Fun times!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the popcorn machine, we use it at least five times a month including movie night, the grandkids absolutely love watching the popcorn popping out of bowl and into the glass cabin, we purchase candy to put into the snack compartment, the ambiance makes for a enjoyable time
customer_reviews.author: terry gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Like most people, we have spent an extraordinary time at home kids during the COVID-19 pandemic. For months, while watching movies at home, my kids pleaded with us to buy a popcorn machine instead of using the kitchen/stove. They wanted the process to be fun and easy. This Nostalgia machine fits the bill. It works perfectly, and it is easy to use. The cleaning, as with any machine or pots and pans, takes a bit of time. But,overall this is a hit in my household!
customer_reviews.author: PTS

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: First, the package was reported as undeliverable because it was damaged. I guess it was returned and I finally received my popcorn machine. But when I opened the box there were ZERO instructions on putting it together a spoke on one of the wheels was broken. I ended up putting it together by looking at the picture on the box and used an epoxy glue to repair the spoke. It works and popped great popcorn but honestly for the price I paid, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Theater Room Popcorn Machine
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. The assembly screws for the it were good with the exception of the top plate 4 screws. They were too short and would not catch. I had to find longer screws. Wheels are a bit wiggly, but overall it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Villalpando

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize how big this popcorn machine was when we ordered it, I love it and it works perfectly for our movie nights. The only thing was I ordered the 10oz popcorn packages and I can only use it for big crowds or the rest goes to waste. Other than that I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: taneika abram

customer_reviews.title: Love this popcorn maker
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn machine is exactly what we were looking for to add to our movie room. It is a sturdy, quality machine. We found it to be a little cumbersome to move around though. The kids love the concession candy area. I highly recommend this popcorn maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Eifert

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the family playroom
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this popcorn machines!!!! Makes the very best. Had an older model that no longer heated up and popped the corn. Ordered this one to replace it. Great machine. Only thing disappointing about the newer ones is that the light no longer is a warming light. Our family liked that feature a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great for popcorn lovers
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal. We love popcorn on movie nights and with 6 of us this works perfectly. It looks great, cleans easily and has plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen and Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any setting!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to use at various events. It works great, very simple to use, we clean glass with vinegar and water solution, breaks down oils. Taste just like the movie theater!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great popcorn when it works
customer_reviews.text: The gears that turn the agitator in the pot Do not work well they donot stay together And the agitator stops and the popcorn Burns .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth e.

customer_reviews.title: Great living room addition!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one! We all Love popcorn, grand daughter can’t get enough.. she loves it. Husband had to use different hardware, (what it came with, wasn’t sturdy enough) it’s used almost every night! Use coconut oil much easier to clean up and the Amish popcorn is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Di Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great for parties and movie nights! Always a big hit. Took maybe an hour to assemble by myself. Easy to clean. The glass steams up while popping but really not a bad thing. We get lots of complaints. I love that I don’t need to take up space on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Works in a limited fashion
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 jars of orvil red and bocker popcorn, but now it jams up instead of ejecting the popcorn as it pops and I can only pop about 4 ounces at a time (instead of the rated 10 ounces). Cleaned it, measure the oil carefully, checked that the bowl is seated properly. It just doesn't work well any more.
customer_reviews.author: brower

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 months now and love it very much!! You will get about 10 kernels that don't pop but no biggie.. I think I make popcorn every day now. I have perfected it to.... I buy the pre bags with the butter and kernals and add 1T of coconut oil to that and it comes out perfectly every time.. love it
customer_reviews.author: Star Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Makes some yummy popcorn
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly fine and doesnt have any issues. Just felt like other models offer better prices. But sometimes better prices mean ugly quality.
customer_reviews.author: Noose

customer_reviews.title: Great Popper
customer_reviews.text: We like that it makes ALOT of popcorn with only one container full. We had a six ounce but usually made it three times to fill up the bottom. Plus, these people have a number to call whereas, Great Northern makes you contact them by email.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Great Machine! My only complaint is that I wish the side handle/table was bigger. Came in very good condition, no dents as in other reviews. Makes a ton of popcorn. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working correctly within first month
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked great the first two uses. Upon the third use, the popcorn started getting compacted into the kettle and burning to the point I had to turn it off. Amazon customer support has not been helpful. I am very disappointed with this purchase and would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased 3 now as gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are such a hit that I purchase as closing gifts for clients..
customer_reviews.author: KMF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this popcorn machine to my husband as a gift, and he LOVES it! It's such a fun popcorn machine and makes delicious popcorn for a fun night inside or just a fun snack! Ideal for the popcorn lover!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Sims

customer_reviews.title: All things POPCORN - a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but I am Happy I went with this purchase. The black and gold fits with my decor and doesn’t look childish. Easy enough for my 10 year old to use. No wasted kernels but must turn off once the piping stops or there could some burning. All around great popcorn machine.
customer_reviews.author: URCINA

customer_reviews.title: Very good Popcorn Machine
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and makes delicious popcorn. I'm not good on sizes so it is a little smaller than what I expected. Other than that I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN EMBRY

customer_reviews.title: Don't but this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the small local nonprofit hospice I work for and after 2 uses, the motor on the popcorn heater failed and the piece that rotates so the popcorn doesn't burn failed. This was a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn machine may just be the best thing I have ever purchased in my life, no seriously this thing is absolutely amazing. Highly recommended!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We just received it. Can’t wait to use it this weekend!!!! It looks awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita J. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn machine 😊
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our employees at work for when we want a popcorn day. It seems to work very well and our employees seem to enjoy it. Win win for all! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Love it but want the concession light to work
customer_reviews.text: So i just got this as a gift and i am so in love with it but im really dissappointed that the concession light is not working. Im wondering if there is a way to fix it, i put two double A batteries brand new and still not working. Please let me know if something else needs to be done for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Yerena

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this popcorn machine a handful of times and so far we are very happy with it. Makes great popcorn and surprisingly pretty easy to clean. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dye

customer_reviews.title: like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: first i apologize , every thing i need was in my box.did not have a thing.but your manual !!! i lose my cool. i started form the back an worked my way forward a little over 2 hours, but i like it thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ramwing

customer_reviews.title: The price
customer_reviews.text: Very cool machine, it has that man cave aesthetic look to it , great for entertaining, the price is just great, very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Rockabilly555

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE it. ❤ Beautifully made, large storage compartment, wheels are real and work. Very easy to assemble and came in sturdy packaging. Overall, I already have and will continue to recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We love use this with our kids. Has worked great
customer_reviews.author: DiaperMom

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Peice of junk...pop corn jams in bucket and gears strip out
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Yummmy
customer_reviews.text: We love popcorn and this is great for movie night and football and we anytime. It was a bit of pain to build but I am not super patient. The door and shelf seem flimsy but other than that built like gym rat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: LOOK AT ME LOOK AT ME IM THE MOVIE THEATER NOW
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE MASTERED MAKING MOVIE THEATER POPCORN DURING THIS EPIDEMIC!!!!! I judge movie theaters now for their bad popcorn. It also doesn't have teflon which is great because I have birbs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Kettle gets very hot.🔥
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love the convenience of getting popcorn whenever we choose after popping.👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Norell R. Mack Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect popcorn!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to our theater room. It makes the perfect popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality. The light doesn’t keep the popcorn warm is my biggest issue. My wife is super picky and worried she wouldn’t like the look. Actually it fit very well with our color and decor in our family/movie room
customer_reviews.author: Neil E Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love it - didn't have any of the issues reported in negative reviews. Easy to take out heating element to clean. Do the research and get a good coconut oil and flavocol a must for the authentic movie theater popcorn. Can also make kettle and other flavors as well, enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: love it. especially the front & back doors instead ...
customer_reviews.text: got a bigger kettle, love it. especially the front & back doors instead of just deep fron door
customer_reviews.author: Ron Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The whole family love the use of this popcorn machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: some stuff was not included like it says
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the measuring cup for the kernels or the oil measuring spoon and the popcorn scoop that is says comes with it in the product information section.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome to clean
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a dent. Needed to fix, very disappointing. The machine sounds awful when it’s heating up. It’s cumbersome to clean. But the popcorn is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! Makes and holds enough popcorn for my large family of 8. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the nursing home. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great movie night addition
customer_reviews.text: We use this weekly. A full batch is more than enough for our family of 5. The base is less than desirable, but the popcorn maker itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole craven

customer_reviews.title: Geat product.  My husband's office loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes tons of great popcorn. It is a bit difficult to clean well.
customer_reviews.author: V. E. South

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This item was smaller than advertised and is very flimsy. It works but is not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good only thing the handle that dumps the pop corn knob broke two weeks after we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Everything online is not as it appears
customer_reviews.text: As I took it out the box I immediately notice everything was upside down I’m very disappointed. For what it cost it should not have come packaged this way.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: No directions!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Very upset that it did not come With directions!!!
customer_reviews.author: renee falcioni

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband Loves this popcorn maker. Looks great in the Theater!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love it 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this and it makes thee best popcorn ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's easy to clean because you can remove the canister. It pops very well. I just wish it would automatically stop when the popcorn is done.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly like the picture. Easy to clean and operate! How great in our home theater!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Unpopped seeds drop through to a tray for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife for Christmas. She loves it. When we have a lot of people over it’s a hit. Just like eating popcorn at the movies.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! Built well and very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Danette

customer_reviews.title: The machine is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: the product is of excellent quality, it does not take up much space, the color makes it elegant, the pop corn is crisp, easy to make and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for making soup
customer_reviews.text: It pops corn, hasn’t burnt the house down so that’s a plus
customer_reviews.author: Johnny weekend

customer_reviews.title: That was disappointing but overall it’s a nice popcorn machine and good for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: One strand of lights didn’t work in the front when we had it all assembled. That was disappointing but overall it’s a nice popcorn machine and good for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great until warranty went out.
customer_reviews.text: Items was great for a couple of uses than it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: lacy prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a home theater room
customer_reviews.text: Really looks the part and works well in a home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I had this now for over a year and it still make great popcorn and clean up is amazing. My only dislike is I wish you can adjust the lid to allow more steam to escape. Because of this the popcorn isn't as crunchy as I would like. Also one of the spokes broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The item came to me and has a defect I tried calling custom service no one answered it is put together so it is very hard to return
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Product broke within 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this popcorn machine for my company and its already broke. The kettle never gets hot anymore so it doesn't pop corn. So it just spins the oil and corn around. We had a different one that lasted several years and still did not have a single problem when we replaced it. We just wanted a bigger one. Not a good product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McElroy

customer_reviews.title: The kids were a amazed
customer_reviews.text: It was the hit of our Easter celebration. The kids were a amazed
customer_reviews.author: Anna Martinez

product_meta.title: Nostalgia Vintage 10-Ounce Professional Popcorn and Concession Cart | 59" Tall, Makes 40 Cups of Popcorn, Kernel Measuring Cup, Oil Measuring Spoon & Scoop | Red (CCP610)
product_meta.description: Color:Red| Style Name:Concession CartModeled after the antique popcorn carts of the early 1900s, this beauty features a 10-ounce kettle with built-in stirring system, and pops the most delectable batches of popcorn time and time again. The tempered glass door and windows with lighted interior let everyone view each kernel being popped. Keep supplies on hand in the convenient storage compartment located in the base. If space is an issue the top is removable and becomes a countertop unit.
feature_bullets: 42 CUPS OF POPCORN - Whether movie time or snack time, this unit pops up to 40 cups of movie theater-style popcorn per batch to keep popcorn buckets full.

NOSTALGIA POPCORN KITS - Unit works perfectly with all Nostalgia popcorn kits - try the Theater Hot Air & Kettle Kit (KPK400), the 4 Oz. Popcorn Oil and Seasoning Packs (KPP424), the Reusable Popcorn Bowls (PPB600), or the Pre-Measured Coconut Oil Popcorn Kit (PCSP5).

10-OUNCE KETTLE - Stainless steel kettle holds 10 ounces of popcorn kernels and is designed with a built-in kernel stirring system and dual-hinged lid to easily empty popcorn. Kettle can be removed for easy cleaning.
TEMPERED SAFETY GLASS - Tempered glass windows are designed to resist breakage while being scratch and heat resistant to keep you and your family safe.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: 59.75 in x 19.5 in x 31.5 in
ROOM AMBIANCE - Lighted interior creates a fun and pleasant room ambiance, and allows you to watch your popcorn pop.
CONCESSION STAND - Cart base doubles as a lighted concession stand for displaying chocolate bars, candy pieces and other munchable theater snacks.
EASY MOBILITY - 16-inch bicycle-style rubber wheels and a pull handle make this an easy to maneuver unit, ready to be wheeled wherever it needs to go.
TILT SERVING DOOR - Outfitted with a tilt-out drop door for easy scooping and serving of popcorn.
HANDY STORAGE COMPARTMENT - Conveniently store popcorn kernels, oils, seasonings, and other popcorn serving accessories in the base of the unit.
